dcterms:creator: Maël Jullien
Marco Valentino
André Freitas
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of clinical trial reports specifically related to breast cancer, containing a total of 7,400 statements categorized into training, development, and hidden test sets. Each statement is labeled as either 'entailment' or 'contradiction', focusing on evaluating natural language inference capabilities.
dcterms:title: Clinical Trial Reports (CTR)

dcterms:creator: Maël Jullien
Marco Valentino
Hannah Frost
Paul O’regan
Donal Landers
André Freitas
dcterms:description: NLI4CT is a dataset designed for multi-evidence natural language inference tasks, focusing on clinical trial data. It includes a variety of statements that require reasoning across multiple pieces of evidence.
dcterms:title: NLI4CT (Multi-Evidence Natural Language Inference for Clinical Trial Data)

dcterms:creator: Ankit Pal
Logesh Kumar Umapathi
Malaikannan Sankarasubbu
dcterms:description: Med-HALT is a benchmark dataset aimed at evaluating the hallucination tendencies of large language models in the medical domain, specifically focusing on their ability to generate accurate and reliable information.
dcterms:title: Med-HALT (Medical Domain Hallucination Test)
